overview: Back in his young adult days, Hyun-sik is a passionate musician who is eager to try new music. He has his eyes on Jae-ha’s gifted musical talent and asks him to join his band called ‘Spring Summer Autumn Winter’. Together, they open a new era by establishing the culture of live-music concert and get a big fame.
tagline: The story of two gifted Korean musicians’ most splendid days.
title: Resonance
